data.eml:eml: Butterflies of Guinea-Bissau: VIII. New data, new reports, corrections and biodiversity (Lepidoptera: Papilionoidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bivar-De-Sousa, António, Vasconcelos, Sasha, Mendes, Luís F., Larsen, Torben B., Baker, Jon, Guilherme, João L. (2016): Butterflies of Guinea-Bissau: VIII. New data, new reports, corrections and biodiversity (Lepidoptera: Papilionoidea). Zootaxa 4201 (1): 1-77, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4201.1.1
